structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.catch_line: Steering device not to be defective.
law.text: No owner shall knowingly operate or permit to be operated on a highway a motor vehicle upon which the steering device is defective.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2739g-27.
